description: This file declares the 'Notification' class within the WebSockets::JsonRpc namespace, which inherits from a base JSONRPC message class. It provides a constructor, destructor, and methods to convert the notification to a string and validate it.

classes.name: Notification
classes.description: A class representing a JSON-RPC notification message within the WebSockets namespace, inheriting from a core message class.

methods.name: virtual ~Notification
methods.description: Default destructor for the Notification class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the notification.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks if the notification message is valid.

methods.name: virtual ~Notification
methods.description: Default destructor for the Notification class.

methods.name: toString
methods.description: Returns a string representation of the notification.

methods.name: isValid
methods.description: Checks if the notification message is valid.
